name: Mustafa Takhtar
story: Jabr Kushan grew up in the city of Isfahan, Iran. He joined the Iranian military at a young age and served for several years before being recruited by the international mercenary group known as OPFOR. Jabr is known for his precise and unrelenting tactics as a sharpshooter. Despite his stoic demeanor, he deeply cares for his wife and children back home and hopes to one day retire from the military life to be with them.
